member.name: P:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.WSL
member.summary: The WSL Distro being used, or null if not using WSL.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.Initialize(DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initialize the CondaManager with optional conda path and WSL settings.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.Reset
member.summary: Reset the CondaManager to uninitialized state.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.GetCondaOrMambaPath
member.summary: Get the conda or mamba executable path.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.GetCondaOrMambaPathWSL(DotNetPythonBridge.Utils.WSL_Helper.WSL_Distro)
member.summary: Get the conda or mamba executable path in WSL.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.ListEnvironments(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the list of conda environments (parsed from conda info --json).

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.ListEnvironmentsWSL(DotNetPythonBridge.Utils.WSL_Helper.WSL_Distro,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the list of conda environments in WSL (parsed from conda info --json).

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.GetEnvironment(System.String)
member.summary: Get a specific Conda environment by name. Returns a PythonEnvironment object if found, which includes the path to the environment.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.GetEnvironmentWSL(System.String,DotNetPythonBridge.Utils.WSL_Helper.WSL_Distro)
member.summary: Get a specific Conda environment by name in WSL. Returns a PythonEnvironment object if found, which includes the path to the environment.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.CreateEnvironment(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new Conda environment from YAML file.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.CreateEnvironmentWSL(System.String,System.String,DotNetPythonBridge.Utils.WSL_Helper.WSL_Distro)
member.summary: Create a new Conda environment from YAML file in WSL.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.DeleteEnvironment(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a Conda environment by name.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.CondaManager.DeleteEnvironmentWSL(System.String,DotNetPythonBridge.Utils.WSL_Helper.WSL_Distro)
member.summary: Delete a Conda environment by name in WSL.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithCondaPath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the default conda executable path.
member.param: The path to the conda executable.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithWSLDistro(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the default WSL distribution name.
member.param: The name of the WSL distribution.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithWSLCondaPath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the default conda path inside WSL. Can be WSL path e.g. "/home/username/miniconda3/bin/conda". Or the equivalent Windows path e.g. @"\\wsl$\Ubuntu-20.04\home\username\miniconda3\bin\conda".
member.param: The path to conda inside WSL.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithCondaDetectionTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for conda detection.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithCondaWhichTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for the 'conda which' command.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithCondaExecutableCheckTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for checking the conda executable.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithCondaListEnvironmentsTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for listing conda environments.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithCondaCreateEnvironmentTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for creating a conda environment.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithCondaDeleteEnvironmentTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for deleting a conda environment.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithWSLListDistrosTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for listing WSL distributions.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithWSLWarmupTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for WSL warmup.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithWSLDistroDoesFileExistTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for checking if a file exists in the WSL distribution.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithWSLWarmupRetryDelay(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the retry delay for WSL warmup.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithWSLWarmupRetries(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the number of retries for WSL warmup.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.DotNetPythonBridgeOptions.WithWSLGetCondaPathRetries(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the number of retries for getting the conda path in WSL.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.WithPort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the default port for the Python service. A value of 0 means the port will be assigned automatically.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.WithServiceArgs(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the default arguments for the Python service. These arguments will be passed when starting the service.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.EnableHealthCheck(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables health checks for the Python service. Health checks help ensure the service is running correctly.
member.param: True to enable health checks; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.WithServiceRetryCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the number of retries for the Python service in case of failure. This helps in making the service more resilient.
member.param: The number of retry attempts to set.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.WithHealthCheckTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout duration for health checks. This defines how long to wait for a health check response before timing out.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.WithForceKillTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout duration for forcefully killing the Python service. This is used when the service does not respond.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.WithStopTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timeout duration for stopping the Python service gracefully. This allows the service to shut down properly.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.WithHealthCheckRetryDelay(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the delay duration between health check retries. This helps in managing the frequency of health checks.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.PythonServiceOptions.WithProcessStoppedCheckDelay(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the delay duration for checking if the process has stopped. This helps in ensuring the process is monitored effectively.

member.name: M:DotNetPythonBridge.Utils.BashCommandBuilder.BuildBashCreateCondaEnvCmd(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Builds a bash command string to create a Conda environment, properly escaping arguments.
member.param: The full path to the conda or mamba executable.
The path to the YAML file.
Optional environment name to override the YAML.
member.returns: A bash command string suitable for use with WSL.
